p: A linear correlation between the observed biological activities of E. umbellata essential oil sample vs observed activities exhibited by the standard used (Ascorbic acid, galantamine, and acarbose) have been presented in Fig.Â 6. The regression value for % DPPH inhibition by essential oil and ascorbic acid (Fig. 6a) is 0.9868 while against ABTS (Fig. 6b) it is 0.9407.
